false_edge_query.name: 虚假边噪声查询
false_edge_query.description: 测试系统对错误节点连接的处理能力。该类噪声通过替换边的源节点或目标节点ID，创建原本不存在的连接关系，用于评估图数据库对虚假边的鲁棒性。

queries.nl: 验证基因/蛋白节点（ID: 645402）的药物靶点关系和通路，原始ID: 26119 被替换为 645402。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (p:gene_protein)-[r]-(connected)
WHERE p.id = '645402'
WITH p, type(r) as rel_type, labels(connected)[0] as connected_type, count(*) as cnt
RETURN p.name, rel_type, connected_type, cnt
ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 30

queries.nl: 验证药物节点（ID: DB14897）在噪声数据中的连接情况，原始ID: DB00496 被替换为 DB14897。测试系统如何处理这个错误的边连接。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (d:drug)-[r]->(target)
WHERE d.id = 'DB14897' OR d.name CONTAINS 'DB14897'
RETURN d, type(r) as rel_type, target LIMIT 20

relation_type_noise_query.name: 关系类型噪声查询
relation_type_noise_query.description: 测试系统对错误关系类型的处理能力。该类噪声将关系类型替换为语义相似但不正确的类型，用于评估系统对关系语义错误的敏感度。

queries.nl: 测试关系类型噪声：'drug_drug'→'drug_effect'，相似度: 0.7282。验证药物交互查询的准确性。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (d1:drug)-[:drug_effect]->(d2)
RETURN d1.name as drug, labels(d2)[0] as target_type, d2.name as target
LIMIT 30

queries.nl: 测试关系类型噪声：'disease_protein'→'disease_disease'，相似度: 0.7913。验证疾病相关查询的鲁棒性。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (d:disease)-[:disease_disease]->(target)
RETURN d.name as disease, labels(target)[0] as target_type, target.name
LIMIT 30

name_typo_query.name: 名称拼写错误查询
name_typo_query.description: 测试系统对节点名称拼写错误的处理能力。该类噪声在节点名称中引入字符级别的拼写错误，用于评估系统的模糊匹配和错误容忍能力。

queries.nl: 测试名称拼写错误：未知类型节点的名称'adrenal gland'被修改为'adreonal gland'。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n {name: 'adreonal gland'})-[r]-(connected)
RETURN labels(n)[0] as node_type, n.name, type(r) as rel_type, connected.name
LIMIT 30

queries.nl: 测试名称拼写错误：未知类型节点的名称'Moclobemide'被修改为'Mocloboemide'。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n {name: 'Mocloboemide'})-[r]-(connected)
RETURN labels(n)[0] as node_type, n.name, type(r) as rel_type, connected.name
LIMIT 30

node_type_noise_query.name: 节点类型噪声查询
node_type_noise_query.description: 测试系统对错误节点分类的处理能力。该类噪声将节点的类型标签替换为其他类型，用于评估系统对节点分类错误的鲁棒性。

queries.nl: 测试节点类型噪声：节点类型从'anatomy'被错误标记为'cellular_component'。验证系统对错误节点分类的处理能力。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n:cellular_component)-[r]-(connected)
WHERE n.name = ''
RETURN n.name, n.id, type(r) as rel_type,
       labels(connected)[0] as connected_type, connected.name
LIMIT 30

queries.nl: 测试节点类型噪声：节点类型从'drug'被错误标记为'gene/protein'。验证系统对错误节点分类的处理能力。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n:gene_protein)-[r]-(connected)
WHERE n.name = ''
RETURN n.name, n.id, type(r) as rel_type,
       labels(connected)[0] as connected_type, connected.name
LIMIT 30

aggregation_query.name: 聚合统计查询
aggregation_query.description: 用于评估噪声对图结构整体影响的聚合查询，统计各类型节点和关系的分布情况。

queries.nl: 聚合查询：统计各节点类型的连接数分布，用于评估虚假边对图结构的整体影响。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (d:drug)-[:drug_protein]->(p:gene_protein)
WITH d, COUNT(p) as target_count
ORDER BY target_count DESC
RETURN d.name as drug, target_count LIMIT 50

queries.nl: 聚合查询：统计各关系类型的使用频率，用于评估关系噪声的分布。
queries.cypher:
MATCH ()-[r]->()
WITH type(r) as rel_type, count(*) as cnt
ORDER BY cnt DESC
RETURN rel_type, cnt LIMIT 30

queries.nl: 聚合查询：通过名称模式匹配统计可能包含拼写错误的节点。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n)
WHERE n.name IS NOT NULL
WITH labels(n)[0] as node_type, count(*) as cnt
RETURN node_type, cnt
ORDER BY cnt DESC

queries.nl: 聚合查询：统计各节点类型的数量分布，用于评估节点类型噪声的影响。
queries.cypher:
MATCH (n)
WITH labels(n)[0] as node_type, count(*) as cnt
ORDER BY cnt DESC
RETURN node_type, cnt LIMIT 30
